name: nexo-erp
description: Nexo - Sistema de Gestión Empresarial (ERP) SaaS Multi-Tenant con POS, Inventario, Agendamiento, Comisiones, Marketplace e IA Conversacional
author: Kike

scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.dev: [ ! -f .env ] && cp .env.dev .env || true && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --build
scripts.dev:fresh: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down --volumes --remove-orphans && [ ! -f .env ] && cp .env.dev .env || true && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --build
scripts.logs:all: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f backend frontend mcp-server
scripts.clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down --volumes --remove-orphans && docker system prune -f
scripts.clean:data: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down --volumes --remove-orphans && sudo rm -rf ./data/postgres ./data/n8n ./data/pgadmin ./data/redis && docker system prune -f
scripts.fresh:clean: npm run clean:data && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --build
scripts.backup:db: docker exec postgres_db pg_dumpall -U admin > backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.db:connect: docker exec -it postgres_db psql -U admin -d postgres
scripts.test:backend:watch: docker exec -it back npm run test:watch
scripts.test:backend:coverage: docker exec back npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:prepare: npm run fresh:clean && echo '⏳ Esperando a que la BD esté lista...' && sleep 15
scripts.test:full: npm run test:prepare && npm run test:backend
scripts.mcp:rebuild: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache mcp-server && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d mcp-server
scripts.frontend:rebuild: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache frontend && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d frontend
